WorkItem.Description:
Change Set: 21668
 
Post-build event of the WindowsToolLauncher project is defined as following:
  copy /y $(ProjectDir)..\UnmanagedToManaged\StorageGenerator\Data\windows.xml $(TargetDir)
 
This command failes when $(ProjectDir) contains empty spaces such as "C:\Users\username\Documents\Visual Studio 2008\Projects\PInvokeTool\"
Please add quotations as below.
  copy /y "$(ProjectDir)..\UnmanagedToManaged\StorageGenerator\Data\windows.xml" "$(TargetDir)"
WorkItem.Summary: Build of WindowsToolLauncher fails when $(ProjectDir) contains empty spaces
